extendedInfo.description: A realistic live wallpaper of a look inside your mobile!Location : Home screen -> long touch -> Wallpaper -> Live wallpaper -> aCircuit Board*FEATURE*- Binary Clock as Led- Moving Fan- Blinking lights as led- Brightness - Touch Event on conductor - Sort of fansStart with Double Tapping!!*Sorry : Eris,Hero,Mytouch,Moment,Samsung Intercept,Magic*Youtube url:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jDP6VGRRmWMLEAVE FEED AS A COMMENT!PERMISSIONSNetwork, Bluetooth, GPS : To show them as led whether they are turned on or off.

reviews.title: Great screensaver
reviews.comment: Great app nets a colour change by time setting for LEDs and wires. Great app buy it.
reviews.author: Joseph De Morgan

reviews.title: Best live wallpaper ever
reviews.comment: Love it, real nerdy and Works flawlessly on my Note 2 (and my son\'s S3 mini).
reviews.author: JASON BLANCHFLOWER

reviews.title: Skyrocket
reviews.comment: This is the 3rd phone to have this on and I am an electronics engineer and this is my favorite wallpaper. Looks real good on a 10.1 tablet
reviews.author: brad pollock

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: nice live wallpaper
reviews.author: Ramon Sahagun

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it. My only suggestion is a bit more placement options for LEDs (batt and notification).  New start up sound is hilarious.  Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love at first sight
reviews.comment: Came across this on the android forums and installed it right away.... and just fell in love with it, amazing graphics, nice battery indicator on the left....  If you are a techie and love circuit boards, you would definitely love this theme.  Works perfect on my Google Nexus ICS 4.0.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC DESIRE S ANDROID 2.3.5 SENSE 3.0
reviews.comment: GREAT WALLPAPER! PEOPLE THINK IT\'S A GENUINE VIEW OF THE INSIDE OF MY PHONE LOL AND 58KB AFTER MOVE TO SD CARD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The one I use the longest
reviews.comment: Paired with Minimalistic text widget maker makes it even greater because you can make invisible widgets and start apps by clicking on different transistors, diodes,chips... The only issue I have is the behaviour of the battery indicator; can\'t grasp it\'s logic-sometimes it\'s flashing, sometimes steady, the colours are not consistent with the battery level...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best wallpaper hands down!
reviews.comment: If you\'re a geek, this one\'s for you!

reviews.comment: Works great on my THUNDER!

reviews.comment: was working fine now after ics update lwp doesnt switch screens will give 5 stars when i get a fix or answer for this problem

reviews.comment: I like everything except the company\'s logos are not realistically there.

reviews.title: Pretty neat
reviews.comment: I\'d love to see a HD version for tablets, but this runs and looks well enough on my Sony S Tablet and Droid2 phone. Does not scroll in landscape on tablet,

reviews.comment: I would give 5 stars, but the wallpaper is crooked. It leans to the top left. Sony Xperia Play

reviews.comment: Its funny how the C and R light up like LEDs

reviews.title: Cool background, but won\'t scroll on HTC Sensation
reviews.comment: aCircuit Board is a very cool wallpaper that was the reason to finally sign up for Google Checkout for me.  However, the Live background won\'t scroll as I scroll through my screens... I\'m using a HTC Sensation and the fixed background option isn\'t checked.
